Figured Id share mine! Poor Morgana is always so sad or angry so the poros threw her a little Christmas campfire :P 

[LINK](http://synsinsyn.deviantart.com/art/Morgana-and-The-Poros-Celebrate-Christmas-576952615)

Hope you guys like it! :D

x

She reminds me a bit of Hel from some other moba I probably shouldn't mention... But still good work =3 Love the dress for her in your pic. How'd you decide on how the wings should look? Was it more based on the snowy season or just to break from the norm of purple-y black?

haha I had the idea of a "Snow Angel" like when you lay on the ground, So my original idea was to try and integrate that but it proved too difficult so i just made them a snowy colour haha. Made her look a little more Christmassy! :)

I really wanna like your art because most of it is really good... but holy fuck you basically double all of the champion's breast size and make their outfits and poses display them as much as possible without nudity. It's distracting and looks goofy and so forced. The Morgana picture in particular is my favorite of yours (and I love Morgana in general) and she already has unnecessarily large breasts in official pictures and you still doubled their size... -_-
Granted they are big, even unnecessarily so, but you can still appreciate an artist's rendition for the beauty and aesthetics over breast-size.
If only that {{champion:30}} skin was real {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

Please tell me where can I submit my own art for a chance to appear in this sort of mega-threads.

On one hand, that Amumu (and Annie? I think?) image. Nothing needs to be said about that, I'm warmed.

On another, holy crap that idea of a Snowstorm Karthus, with a bright white blizzard effect and a big snowbally BOOM for his ult (for a literal snowballing Karthus!)...God, I just, I can't take it. I mean, do you have *any* idea how long I've waited for a really good Karthus skin?
Maybe if you kill someone with your ult then a big snowball drops on them. I think this and the Poppy one are both great skin ideas.
